mapper.insert:
SELECT seq_cp_no.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO certification_post ( cp_no, user_no, cp_type, cp_title, cp_contents, cp_mountain_name, cp_hiking_trail, cp_total_time, cp_ascent_time, cp_descent_time, cp_hiking_date, cp_creation_date, cp_transportation, cp_difficulty, cp_deleted_flag, cp_like_count , cp_image_count ) VALUES ( seq_cp_no.currval, #{userNo}, #{certificationPostType}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{certificationPostMountainName}, #{certificationPostHikingTrail}, #{certificationPostTotalTime}, #{certificationPostAscentTime}, #{certificationPostDescentTime}, #{certificationPostHikingDate}, SYSDATE, #{certificationPostTransportation}, #{certificationPostHikingDifficulty}, 0, 0, #{certificationPostImageCount} )
mapper.select: SELECT cp.cp_no, cp.user_no, u.nickname, u.profile_image, u.badge_image, cp.cp_type, cp.cp_title, cp.cp_contents, cp.cp_mountain_name, cp.cp_hiking_trail, cp.cp_total_time, cp.cp_ascent_time, cp.cp_descent_time, cp.cp_hiking_date, cp.cp_creation_date, cp.cp_transportation, cp.cp_difficulty, cp.cp_image_count FROM certification_post cp JOIN users u ON cp.user_no = u.user_no WHERE cp.cp_no = #{postNo} AND cp.cp_deleted_flag = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HASHTAG (HASHTAG_NO, CP_NO, HASHTAG_CONTENT) VALUES (seq_HASHTAG_NO.nextval, #{postNo}, #{certificationPostHashtagContents})
mapper.select: select * from certification_post where user_no =#{userNo} AND cp_type = 0 AND cp_deleted_flag = 0 ORDER BY cp_creation_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE certification_post SET cp_title = #{title}, cp_contents = #{contents}, cp_image_count = #{certificationPostImageCount}, cp_mountain_name = #{certificationPostMountainName}, cp_hiking_trail = #{certificationPostHikingTrail}, cp_total_time = #{certificationPostTotalTime}, cp_ascent_time = #{certificationPostAscentTime}, cp_descent_time = #{certificationPostDescentTime}, cp_hiking_date = #{certificationPostHikingDate}, cp_transportation = #{certificationPostTransportation}, cp_difficulty = #{certificationPostHikingDifficulty} WHERE cp_no = #{postNo}
mapper.select: SELECT cp.*, h.hashtag_content, h.hashtag_no FROM certification_post cp INNER JOIN hashtag h ON cp.cp_no = h.cp_no WHERE cp.cp_no = #{postNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LIKES (LIKE_NO, USER_NO, POST_NO, POST_TYPE, LIKE_DATE) VALUES (seq_like_no.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{postNo}, 0 , SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE certification_post SET cp_like_count = ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes WHERE post_no = #{postNo} AND post_type = 0 ) WHERE cp_no = #{postNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM LIKES WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND POST_NO = #{postNo} AND POST_TYPE=0
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes WHERE post_no = #{postNo} AND post_type = 0
SELECT c.* FROM LIKES l JOIN certification_post c ON l.POST_NO = c.cp_no WHERE l.POST_TYPE = 0 AND CP_DELETED_FLAG=0 AND l.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY l.LIKE_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND post_no = #{postNo} AND post_type = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments(comment_no, user_no,post_no, comment_contents,comment_creation_date, post_type) VALUES(seq_comment_no.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{certificationPostNo}, #{certificationPostCommentContents},sysdate, 0)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comments WHERE POST_TYPE=0 AND COMMENT_NO = #{certificationPostCommentNo} AND USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_no, u.nickname, u.profile_image, c.post_no, c.comment_no, c.comment_contents, c.comment_creation_date FROM comments c JOIN users u ON c.user_no = u.user_no WHERE c.post_no = #{postNo} AND c.post_type = 0 ORDER BY c.comment_creation_date DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT cp.*, u.nickname, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY
cp.cp_creation_date DESC
NVL(cp.cp_like_count, 0) DESC
cp.cp_difficulty ASC
cp.cp_difficulty DESC
cp.cp_creation_date DESC
) AS row_num FROM certification_post cp JOIN users u ON u.user_no = cp.user_no WHERE cp.cp_deleted_flag = 0
AND cp.cp_title LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND u.nickname LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND cp.cp_mountain_name LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
) WHERE row_num BETWEEN #{currentPage} * #{pageSize} + 1 AND (#{currentPage} + 1) * #{pageSize}
